_source.short_desc: TigerConnect is the healthcare industry's most widely adopted, HIPAA-compliant clinical collaboration and patient engagement platform.
_source.long_desc: TigerConnect is the healthcare industry's most widely adopted communication solution for care collaboration and patient engagement. TigerConnect offers provider-and patient-friendly texting, video, and voice communication while adhering to HIPAA-compliance and HITRUST standards for security and privacy. Improve care and outcomes by easily reaching patients and families for follow-up, virtual care, and plan adherence. Enable patients to reach you for virtual visits through a digital front door.
_source.target_audience: TigerConnect serves health systems/IDNs and facilities in acute and post-acute care, SNFs, ambulatory, private practices, dialysis centers, surgical centers, home health/hospice and behavioral health.

media.caption: TigerConnect lets you switch back and forth between messaging patients and messaging colleagues -- all on the same app.
The TigerConnect Roles feature lets staff find who's on-call by Role so the wrong doctor doesn't get called in the middle of the night!

TigerConnect Patient Messaging lets you send secure texts, see responses, and continue text conversations with patients. You can even send broadcast messages to large patient lists about office closures, vaccination reminders, etc.
To support comprehensive virtual care, TigerConnect Patient Engagement enables you to conduct secure group conversations with patients, family members, and other providers via video, voice, and text.
With TigerConnect, both providers and patients can securely attach documents, photos, images, videos and more for pre-appointment preparations, follow-up care, or virtual care consults.

category_features.name: Care Plan Management
category_features.definition: Manage the treatment plan and coordination between care providers and patients with special health care needs

category_features.definition: Communicate using messages within the system

category_features.definition: Access the software remotely via mobile devices

category_features.name: Patient Education
category_features.definition: Educational and medical resources that are delivered to patients online

category_features.name: Patient Engagement
category_features.definition: Allows medical providers to engage patients in a variety of ways to ensure their health.

category_features.name: Patient Portal
category_features.definition: A website and login where patients can access information such as health care records, treatment plants, etc.

category_features.name: Patient Records Management
category_features.definition: Consolidate all patient clinical and billing information in one place

related_products.short_desc: NextGen Healthcare provides ambulatory practices with award-winning solutions along with dedicated support & professional services.
related_products.features: NextGen Healthcare is a leading healthcare software and services company that empowers the transformation of ambulatory care. Our smart, electronic health record solutions - NextGen Office (1-10 physicians) and NextGen Enterprise (10+ physicians) - help ambulatory practices alleviate the burden of documentation, advance clinical outcomes, connect with other health systems, elevate provider and patient satisfaction, streamline the revenue cycle, and foster healthier communities.

related_products.short_desc: Our award-winning healthcare IT solutions give providers greater control, so they can focus on what they do best.
related_products.features: athenaOne organizes the moment of care, performs administrative and quality services to ensure full payment, and tracks all physician orders so doctors can focus on what they do best. Deliver high quality care. With athenaOne, Doctors benefit from continuous access to the best practices of the nation's largest clinical network, the most up-to-date and extensive quality rules and industry guidelines, and 24/7 support.

related_products.short_desc: Mend is the Leading Telehealth, Automated Patient Payments, & Patient Engagement Platform. Reduce no-show rates & engage more patients.
related_products.features:
Best for 11+ Provider Groups

Full Patient Engagement Suite, Telehealth & Complete Digital Patient Management: Automated Patient Payments, Appointment Reminders, AI-Predicted No Shows, Enhanced Virtual Waiting Room, Patient Self-Scheduling & Digital Forms. #1 Rated Support & Custom Workflows. 

Mend Has 98.3% Engagement, 99.85% Video Connection, & Single Digit No-Show Rates.

Mend Has Automation Technology To Integrate With Any EHR, PMS, or Other Systems. Perfect Fit For Large Provider Groups.

related_products.short_desc: Send secure intake and consent forms privately to your clients. HIPAA compliant, e-signature support, online booking and payment
related_products.features:
IntakeQ provides beautiful and secure electronic intake forms for health professionals, enabling them to offer an amazing onboarding experience, while also optimizing and streamlining the intake process.

As a bonus, IntakeQ also offers powerful practice management features, including scheduling, payment, appointment reminders, secure messaging, telehealth, invoicing and insurance billing.

Affordable pricing, 14-day free trial, no credit card required, no software to install.

related_products.short_desc: The Ultimate Patient-1st Engagement Solution. For 20 years SR has been the benchmark by which all others measure themselves.
related_products.features: The Ultimate Patient-1st Engagement Solution. For 20 years SR has been the benchmark by which all others measure themselves. And we're still leading! Let us show you what you should expect from an integrated, patient acquisition and engagement solution!  As the individual practices we started out serving have grown, we've added specialized features for multi-unit operations. We now support many of the nation's largest health systems and retail-based networks.

related_products.short_desc: More time for consultations. Happier clients. Less effort. vcita: HIPAA compliant software designed for your practice. Free Trial!
related_products.features: Nurture your patient relationships with a powerful HIPAA complient CRM app by vcita. Store, manage and label your leads, contacts and patients in one centralized online hub. Get a birds-eye view of your patients' history appointments, payments, invoices, documents and conversations. Have all the information handy wherever you are and whenever you need it with a friendly mobile app and easily collaborate with your team, assigning patients, appointments and incoming requests to staff members.

related_products.short_desc: Engage your patients using HIPAA-compliant patient portal that provides secure messaging and automated reminder system.
related_products.features: Engage your patients using HIPAA-compliant patient portal that gives access to personal health records, provides real-time patient data updates, secure messaging, and automated reminder system.

related_products.short_desc: Our easy-to-use solution helps you engage and connect with your patients and deliver the best virtual care.
related_products.features: PatientPop combines telehealth, communications, and patient intake in a streamlined platform to help you deliver quality care and build lasting relationships with your patients. Combined with Practice Growth Foundation, our solution makes it easy for you to attract patients and retain them for life. We also integrate with the most widely used EMRs to help you enhance your patient connection and deliver the best modern experience.

related_products.short_desc: Our EHR and all-in-one solutions for all practice sizes include patient engagement tools like Telehealth, Patient Portal and more.
related_products.features: ModMed? offers a suite of Patient Engagement tools for practices of all sizes to help increase patient loyalty and add convenience for the following medical specialties: Allergy, Dermatology, ENT, GI, OBGYN, Ophthalmology, Orthopedics, Pain Management, Plastic Surgery, Podiatry and Urology. Patient engagement tools include Telehealth, Patient Portal, Patient Self-Scheduling, ModMed Kiosk, Patient Reminders and Patient Surveys.

related_products.short_desc: Cerner Ambulatory supports more than 55 specialties by delivering integrated clinical and financial solutions and services.
related_products.features: Cerner's PowerChart Ambulatory EHR ensures the right clinicians have the right information at the right time and place to make the best possible decisions. We believe that with information technology and coordination, health care becomes safer, more effective and available to communities worldwide.

>Manage patient intake and referrals more effectively  
>Improve show rates and recall   

Continuously improve your practice with powerful reporting

similar_products.short_desc: Take patient and member relationships to new heights with Salesforce Health Cloud.
similar_products.features: Health Cloud is the trusted, connected platform to power the business of health. By bringing together clinical and non-clinical data into a single source of truth, Health Cloud helps organizations gain a 360-degree view of each customer to elevate the health experience, drive proactive engagement, and influence the best outcomes. Health Cloud equips employees with purpose-built apps, automated industry workflows, and AI-powered customer insights to boost efficiency, collaboration, and growth

We are powered by a robust and comprehensive data network that covers 270 million lives and we help organizations turn health data into insights that create new value for consumers and the companies that serve them.

similar_products.short_desc: HIPAA compliant faxing, email, SMS, forms and signatures with seamless EMR integration.
similar_products.features:
Healthcare providers: It's time to upgrade your faxing solution.
Medsender is an easy-to-use, HIPAA-compliant online fax solution with seamless EMR integration. 

Our optional automation feature is capable of automatically uploading incoming faxes to the corresponding patient charts and notifying the appropriate staff. 

Users can keep their existing fax numbers or get new numbers from Medsender with their preferred area codes.

similar_products.short_desc: Mytonomy Cloud for Healthcare is a video-based patient engagement solution that delivers award-winning short-form video content.
similar_products.features:
Mytonomy Cloud for Healthcare is a video-based patient engagement solution. Mytonomy works with leading institutions to elevate the patient experience, engage patients across the care continuum, and expand access to critical care across diverse populations. 

Their solution delivers award-winning short-form video content combined with intelligent surveys and dynamic communications proven to engage and empower patients with high satisfaction.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Hospital Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Hospital Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Hospital Management software automates processes including billing, appointments, scheduling, regulatory compliance and financial auditing within hospitals. These applications offer integration across the financial, clinical, and operational elements of a healthcare practice and enable users to optimize their office workflow and reduce their operational expenses. Hospital Management software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Medical Lab software, Medical Practice Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software, .

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Medical Practice Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Medical Practice Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Medical Practice Management software automates activities such as patient care, scheduling, billing, claims processing and other related operations for medical practices. By streamlining office workflows, doctors and their staff are able to spend more time with patients and less time on administrative tasks. Medical Practice Management applications can be utilized by private practices, community health centers, long term care and behavioral health facilities, hospitals and other health care organizations. Medical Practice Management software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Patient Case Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Patient Case Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Patient Case Management software is used to manage and track patients within the healthcare and social services professions. This type of software is often used by social service agencies, non-profits, hospitals, and mental health clinics, to track, monitor, and report on the status of long and short term patients. Patient Case Management software is related to Mental Health software, Human Services software and Association Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Patient Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Patient Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Patient Management software incorporates solutions for bed availability management, patient tracking throughout the facility, be it a hospital or a smaller healthcare clinic, and patient queue management for various healthcare organizations. For related software solutions see Patient Case management software and Healthcare Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Patient Portal software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Patient Portal tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Patient Portal software makes it possible for healthcare providers and hospitals to securely connect and communicate with patients online. With Patient Portal software, your patients can take care of their billing and invoicing, view their electronic health records and fill out important intake and insurance forms. Looking for other innovative software to manage your medical practice? Check out Medical Billing software, Medical Practice Management software, Medical Scheduling software, and Patient Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Personalization software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Personalization tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Personalization software is used to customize visitor experience on a website. Personalization software generates targeted recommendations and notifications that are presented to customers during their web browsing sessions.

category_features.name: Appointment Scheduling
category_features.definition: Book appointments via calendar

category_features.name: Confirmation/Reminders
category_features.definition: Automated alerts to upcoming appointments

category_features.name: E-Prescribing
category_features.definition: Electronic prescribing of a medical prescriptions

category_features.name: For Medical Purposes
category_features.definition: Specific for medical use such as diagnosis, treatment, and/or consultation

category_features.name: HIPAA Compliant
category_features.definition: Compliant with HIPAA, which sets standards for sensitive patient data protection

category_features.name: Medical Billing
category_features.definition: Manage billing and payments for a healthcare provider

category_features.name: Multi-Provider Practice
category_features.definition: For practices with multiple providers

category_features.name: One-to-One Messaging
category_features.definition: Send personal messages to clients or attendees

category_features.name: Online Forms
category_features.definition: Create new forms or form templates to help with creation of transactional content

category_features.name: Practice Management
category_features.definition: Managing day-to-day operations of a medical practice such as scheduling appointments, generating reports and more

category_features.name: Remote Treatment Plans
category_features.definition: Create online notes about patient appointments including short or long-term care plans, follow-up appointment schedule, etc.

category_features.name: Video Conferencing
category_features.definition: Adds audio/visual capabilities for users to communicate

related_products.short_desc: Lead stress-free, reliable video appointments with SimplePractice's fully integrated, HIPAA-compliant Telehealth platform.
related_products.features: Telehealth by SimplePractice is a fully integrated video appointment solution that's 100% HIPAA-compliant. You can start your telehealth session from anywhere-no extra logins or hassle for you or your clients. Send paperless intake forms, resources, and other documents directly from the Client Portal. You can also simplify your billing with AutoPay. From start to finish, SimplePractice makes client care easier than ever.

TherapyNotes simplifies administrative work, giving practitioners more time and energy to focus on providing effective care for their clients.

related_products.short_desc:
BlueJeans is the meetings platform for the modern workplace.
Simple. Smart. Trusted.
related_products.features:
BlueJeans is the meetings platform for the modern workplace. We bring video, audio and web conferencing together with the collaboration tools people use every day.

The first cloud service to connect desktops, mobile devices and room systems in one video meeting, BlueJeans makes meetings fast to join and simple to use, so people can work productively where and how they want.

It is the meeting solution teams trust to do their best work.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based telemedicine ready EHR with HIPAA compliant video conferencing, virtual waiting room, and online scheduling.
related_products.features: DrChrono EHR can now be used to provide patients with clinical help in the comfort of their own homes. Online scheduling and HIPAA compliant video conferencing gives our doctors telemedicine capabilities, reducing wait time in the clinic and improving patient experience for those whom it may not be so convenient to get to an urgent care center.

related_products.short_desc: Launch your integrated Telemedicine program today with Mend. Best for 11+ Provider Groups.
related_products.features:
Launch your integrated Telemedicine program today with Mend. 

Best for 11+ Provider Groups, Mend is a healthcare communications platform. Mend can connect to patients anytime, anywhere, and with any device through messaging, video, or forms. Mend is the absolute easiest, fully integrated technology to engage your patients. Get Patient Engagement, Intake Forms, Scheduling, and Appointment Reminders all in one easy to use integrated platform to make your Telehealth a success from the start.

related_products.short_desc: RXNT's cloud-based, telehealth-friendly EHR system with Patient Portal optimizes the patient care experience and streamlines workflows.
related_products.features: RXNT's telemedicine-friendly Electronic Health Records (EHR) system with Patient Portal optimizes the patient care experience from anywhere. Manage communication with secure two-way patient messaging, and electronic reminders keep patients informed about appointments and prescription renewals. Patients benefit from a dedicated patient portal that lets them manage information, schedule appointments, view lab results, and sign consent forms. Plus, seamlessly bill for your telehealth services.

related_products.short_desc: eClinicalWorks is a leader in healthcare IT, providing innovative, customizable Electronic Health Record (EHR) and Practice Management.
related_products.features: eClinicalWorks is a privately held leader in healthcare IT, providing comprehensive Electronic Health Record (EHR) and Practice Management (PM) solutions used by more than 850,000 providers in more than 20 countries.

related_products.short_desc: Electronic health records and Telemedicine software designed for medical offices of all specialties and sizes.
related_products.features: PrognoCIS EHR & Telehealth is a fully-integrated, specialty-specific EHR, practice management and billing suite. Ranked as a Top 10 Cloud-Based EHR by KLAS. Features include: Integrated Telehealth, patient portal, customizable specialty-specific templates, e-prescribing, Meaningful Use dashboard, medical billing software, and more. Both web-based or client/server versions are available. CCHIT and ONC-ATCB certified to help practitioners meet Meaningful Use requirements.

related_products.short_desc: vcita's intuitive, HIPAA-compliant solution helps healthcare providers spend less time on admin and more time delivering quality care.
related_products.features:
Designed specifically for healthcare providers, vcita lets you provide quality patient care from anywhere through a secure and HIPAA compliant platform. 
Reduce no-shows with automated reminders, allow clients to schedule and pay for telehealth sessions and remote multi-participant group events online - all from one single, easy-to-use app. Enhance your patient communication with integrated Zoom functionality and comprehensive CRM capabilities for secure and hassle-free follow-ups.

Your patients can continue to receive the quality care they need from the safety and convenience of their own homes. We integrate with the most widely used EMRs to help you enhance your patient connection and deliver the best modern experience. Some features include: 2-way HD video, unique video link, virtual waiting room, and more.

similar_products.features: PatientPop empowers you to manage the most important aspects of your practice from the cloud so you can treat your patients virtually. Your patients can continue to receive the quality care they need from the safety and convenience of their own homes. We integrate with the most widely used EMRs to help you enhance your patient connection and deliver the best modern experience. Some features include: 2-way HD video, unique video link, virtual waiting room, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: Cliniko is a practice management tool that's loved and trusted by more than 65,000 health professionals around the world.
similar_products.features:
Cliniko is complete practice management software with secure telehealth that's used by over 65k healthcare practitioners in more than 95 countries worldwide. Cliniko also includes online booking, online payments, treatment notes, patient communications, and much more. All data transmitted between you and Cliniko is encrypted and Cliniko meets or exceeds all regulations of the Australian Privacy Principles, GDPR, PIPEDA, and HIPAA.

Sign up to try Cliniko free for 30 days.

similar_products.short_desc: RXNT's cloud-based, telehealth-friendly EHR system with Patient Portal optimizes the patient care experience and streamlines workflows.
similar_products.features: RXNT's telemedicine-friendly Electronic Health Records (EHR) system with Patient Portal optimizes the patient care experience from anywhere. Manage communication with secure two-way patient messaging, and electronic reminders keep patients informed about appointments and prescription renewals. Patients benefit from a dedicated patient portal that lets them manage information, schedule appointments, view lab results, and sign consent forms. Plus, seamlessly bill for your telehealth services.

similar_products.short_desc: Curogram is a cloud-based HIPAA compliant patient engagement platform that integrates with all EMR/EHR systems.
similar_products.features:
Curogram is a cloud-based HIPAA-compliant patient engagement platform that integrates with all EMR/EHR systems. 

Curogram provides a complete patient engagement experience for a fraction of the cost of a postage stamp. The platform includes: easy-to-use secure two-way texting, electronic patient forms, smart appointment booking and reminders, mass texting, automated survey and rating requests, online payments  and multi-user telemedicine.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Electronic Medical Records software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Electronic Medical Records tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Electronic Medical Records software (EMR) automates the documentation, storage and retrieval of patient records. EMR software streamlines data entry, automates diagnosis and CPT code selection, minimizes required paper records, reduces transcription costs, provides up-to-date patient histories and reduces the turnaround time for patient visits and retrieving lab results. Using Electronic Medical Records solutions, doctors, offices and healthcare organizations save time, reduce medical errors, perform less paperwork and provide more accurate diagnoses for their patients. Electronic Medical Records software is related to Healthcare Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Practice Management software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

Quickly browse through hundreds of Home Health Care tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Home Health Care software aids with billing, financial, clinical, scheduling, medical record, and point of care aspects of home health care. This type of software also offers medical notes, billing, insurance claims, inventory, and medication management tools. Home Health Care software is related to Long Term Care software, Medical Billing software, Medical Scheduling software, Electronic Medical Records software, and Medical Practice Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Medical Practice Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Medical Practice Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Medical Practice Management software automates activities such as patient care, scheduling, billing, claims processing and other related operations for medical practices. By streamlining office workflows, doctors and their staff are able to spend more time with patients and less time on administrative tasks. Medical Practice Management applications can be utilized by private practices, community health centers, long term care and behavioral health facilities, hospitals and other health care organizations. Medical Practice Management software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

Quickly browse through hundreds of Mental Health tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Mental Health software handles activities such as patient record keeping, billing, and scheduling for mental health facilities. Typically, Mental Health applications offer a variety of flexible features, which assist in the management and organization of patient records, progress notes, billing and invoicing, and staff and appointment scheduling. Mental health clinics use these applications to centralize and automate essential patient care and medical business processes including patient reporting generation, treatment records, accounts receivable, payment processing, patient data sharing, document management, electronic claims, collections, and financial reporting. Mental Health software is related to Human Services software, Electronic Medical Records software, Medical Billing software, Medical Practice Management software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

related_categories.description: Web Conferencing software enables organizations to conduct interactive conferences and meetings online. Typical features include: two-way audio, video conferencing, application sharing, presentation streaming, presence/availability detection and electronic hand raising. Web Conferencing applications also often feature instant messaging, presence and contact management features. Web Conferencing software is related to Web Collaboration software.
